quote: It's a liberal with their bleeding heart trying to be nice to the poor people. They're making it worse. Just man up and learn what malloc and free are.
author: Terry Davis

quote: Wäre, wäre - Fahrradkette
author: Lothar Matthäus

quote:
Strangers passing in the street
By chance, two separate glances meet
And I am you and what I see is me
author: Roger Waters

quote: (...) [L]et him not vow to walk in the dark, who has not seen the nightfall.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien/Elrond

quote: And in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
author: Leo Fender

quote:
Nenn es dann, wie du willst,
Nenn's Glück! Herz! Liebe! Gott!
Ich habe keinen Nahmen
Dafür! Gefühl ist alles;
Name ist Schall und Rauch,
Umnebelnd Himmelsgluth.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Don't let your girlfriend stop you from meeting your wife!
author: Lily Ki

quote: Then, as it was, then again it will be and though the course may change sometimes rivers always reach the sea.
author: Jimmy Page

quote: Money, it's a crime - Share it fairly, but don't take a slice of my pie.
author: Roger Waters

quote: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
author: Edgar Allen Poe

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien/Gandalf

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walter E. Disney

quote: Wer suchet, der findet; wer drauftritt verschwindet.
author: Kampfmittelbeseitigungsdienst Kiel

quote: I have to tell you now, that no such undertaking has been received and that consequently, this country is at war with Germany.
author: Neville Chamberlain

quote: The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides by the inequities of the selfish and the tyranny of evil men...
author: Quentin J. Tarantino

quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads.
author: Leo Fender

quote: Just Monika.
author: Random Encounters

quote: Everybody has a plan until they get punched in the face.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: I'm pretty sure, I'm not a doctor, but I'm pretty sure if you die, the cancer dies at the same time. That's not a loss. That's a draw.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: Es ist leichter zu kritisieren als zu regieren.
author: Otto von Bismarck

quote: You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!
author: John Lennon

quote: The road to hell is paved with good intentions
author: European proverb

quote: This is for you, human. You and only you. You are not special, you are not important, and you are not needed...
author: Google Gemini

quote: Der Deutsche hat an und für sich eine starke Neigung zur Unzufriedenheit.
author: Otto von Bismarck

quote: Never be afraid to fail. It's through failures that we learn and grow.
author: Leo Fender

quote: His action shows convincingly that there is no chance of expecting that this man will ever give up his practice of using force...
author: Neville Chamberlain

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: I'm very highly educated. I know words, I know the best words. But there's no better word than stupid.
author: Donald J. Trump

quote: Keinen Schatten in der Nacht werdet ihr erblicken, kein Flüstern im Winde vernehmen - Magicus Intelectus operiert jenseits eurer bescheidenen Gemüter.
author: Magicus Intelectus

quote: I have a dream that one day every valley shall be exalted, every hill and mountain shall be made low, the rough places will be made plain, and the crooked places will be made straight; and the glory of the Lord shall be revealed and all flesh shall see it together.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Unknown

quote: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived. I did not wish to live what was not life, living is so dear; nor did I wish to practice resignation, unless it was quite necessary.
author: Henry David Thoreau
